text: Arau ami sihamtara oparata tata atyarasyaka karai dichilo ye, praanara paraibarte praana, cakura paraibarte caku, nakara paraibarte naka, kanara paraibarte kana, damtara paraibarte damta arau aghatara paraibarte anuraupa aghata. Tara pichata konoba'i seya ksama karaile tara babe seya kaphapharaa haâ€™ba. Arau allahe yi aratirna karaiche se'i anuyayi yisakale bidhana nidiye sihamte'i yalima
